reviewText: I actually received this as a free offer and didn't think much about it. Then I watched it! Great info from the latest journals and Dr Greger adds a bit of humor to the insights. Excellent. I think I'll go ahead and order volume 18. Wish I could afford all of them!
I love these DVD's. I watch them over and over and frequently refer back to them for facts I have forgotten. Anyone interested in health and nutrition should own the entire collection.
Helps me choose the most nutritious food. End result is i am healthier and feel better. Thank you Dr. Gregor!
